lines.text: [repeated line]
Audrey Rose. Audrey, it's me. It's Daddy.
It's alright now. It's alright. The soul is set free. The soul is set free.
Mrs. Templeton, do you believe in reincarnation?
I do now.
What do you mean your daughter? This my daughter we're talking about? My child!
You don't understand.
I don't want to understand. You're crazy? And my husband said so and I want you outta of here.
Is your fear talking?
No, this is me talking and I am telling my daughter is not possessed.
We're not talking about possession, Mrs. Templeton. We're talking about reincarnation.
[repeated line]
Daddy, help me! It's so hot!
[last lines]

[narrating voice over]
When it does she will find parents who are, oh, generous, understanding, and who will love her as we all loved her.
You're saying reincarnation. I mean, is that what you're saying?
Watch your language Mother there children present.
It'd be really wonderful, wouldn't it mom. It'd be fantastic.
[first lines]
Ivy!
Hi mom!
